name: Shadow of Death
description: A large celestial creature embodying chaotic evil, the Shadow of Death has exceptional Dexterity and Charisma, with truesight capabilities up to 120 feet. It inflicts necrotic damage and possesses a haunting presence that can instill fear in its enemies.
memorable: Its ability to impose visions of death and render creatures unable to be resurrected unless by a wish spell makes it particularly fearsome.
goals: Its primary goal is to instill fear and eliminate foes, often attacking from darkness while manipulating its enemies.
relations: May be related to other malevolent celestial entities or serve dark deities that thrive in chaos and death.
environment: Typically found in dark or dimly lit areas where its powers can be maximized.
strengths: Exceptional agility and magical resistance make it a difficult opponent to confront.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which can significantly harm it.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack with a shortsword that deals piercing and necrotic damage, while also employing fear tactics to paralyze its enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Vision of Ending, which frightens and paralyzes non-undead creatures within 60 feet.
senses: It has truesight up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 24, allowing it to easily detect hidden creatures.
skills: Demonstrates remarkable skills in perception with a +14 modifier.
additional_information: Immunity to cold, necrotic, and poison damage.
Magic resistance provides advantage against spells.
Deathly Shroud inflicts necrotic damage while diminishing light.
Explodes upon death causing additional necrotic damage.
Wounds inflicted can reduce target's hit point maximum.
test_queries: creature that fears using visions of death
celestial creature that thrives in darkness
strong manipulative monster with necrotic attacks
powerful celestial being vulnerable to radiant damage
shadowy monster with deadly explosion upon death
